single.title: Detections that populate the Risk index

search.query: | rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | table search actions title | rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","") | table index sourcetype datamodel search actions title | eval data_sources=coalesce(index,datamodel) | search title=* actions=risk | eval data_source=coalesce(index, datamodel) | stats dc(title) as Risk_Detections

chart.title: Data Sources that are used in Risk Rules

search.query: | rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | table search actions title | rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","") | table index sourcetype datamodel search actions title | eval data_sources=coalesce(index,datamodel) | eval data_source=coalesce(index, datamodel) | stats count by data_source

| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | table search actions title | rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | rex field=search "mitre_tactic=(?<mitre_tactic>.+)" | rex field=search "mitre_technique=(?<mitre_technique>.+)" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","") | table index sourcetype datamodel search actions title mitre_technique mitre_tactic | eval data_sources=coalesce(index,datamodel) | eval data_source=coalesce(index, datamodel) | stats count by mitre_technique

| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | table search actions title | rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | rex field=search "mitre_tactic=(?<mitre_tactic>.+)" | rex field=search "mitre_technique=(?<mitre_technique>.+)" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","") | table index sourcetype datamodel search actions title mitre_technique mitre_tactic | eval data_sources=coalesce(index,datamodel) | eval data_source=coalesce(index, datamodel) | stats count by mitre_tactic

| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | table search actions title | rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | rex field=search "mitre_tactic=(?<mitre_tactic>.+)" | rex field=search "mitre_technique=(?<mitre_technique>.+)" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","") | table index sourcetype datamodel search actions title mitre_technique mitre_tactic | eval data_sources=coalesce(index,datamodel) | eval data_source=coalesce(index, datamodel) | stats values(title) as Risk_Rule, values(mitre_tactic) as mitre_tactic values(mitre_technique) as mitre_technique by data_source

| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | table search actions title | rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | rex field=search "mitre_tactic=(?<mitre_tactic>.+)" | rex field=search "mitre_technique=(?<mitre_technique>.+)" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","") | table index sourcetype datamodel search actions title mitre_technique mitre_tactic | eval data_sources=coalesce(index,datamodel) | eval data_source=coalesce(index, datamodel) | eval source=title
| join type=left source [search index=risk source=* | stats count as total_events earliest(_time) as first_seen last(_time) as last_seen by source ]
| table title mitre_technique mitre_tactic first_seen last_seen total_events
| fieldformat first_seen=strftime(first_seen, "%c") | fieldformat last_seen=strftime(last_seen, "%c") | fillnull total_events value="No Events Found"

| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | table search actions title | rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | rex field=search "aa_tactic=(?<aa_tactic>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "aa_tech=(?<aa_tech>.+?)\s" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","") | table index sourcetype datamodel search actions title aa_tech aa_tactic | eval data_sources=coalesce(index,datamodel) | search title="Threat - AA - *" | eval data_source=coalesce(index, datamodel) | table data_source | dedup data_source | sort data_source

| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | table search actions title | rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | rex field=search "mitre_tactic=(?<mitre_tactic>.+)" | rex field=search "mitre_technique=(?<mitre_technique>.+)" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","") | table index sourcetype datamodel search actions title mitre_technique mitre_tactic | eval data_source=coalesce(index,datamodel) | table mitre_tactic | dedup mitre_tactic | sort mitre_tactic

| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | table search actions title | rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | rex field=search "mitre_tactic=(?<mitre_tactic>.+)" | rex field=search "mitre_technique=(?<mitre_technique>.+)" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","") | table index sourcetype datamodel search actions title mitre_technique mitre_tactic | eval data_source=coalesce(index,datamodel) | table mitre_technique | dedup mitre_technique | sort mitre_technique

| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | rename action.risk.param._risk as risk_param action.risk.param._risk_object_type as risk_object_type0 action.risk.param._risk_object as risk_object0 action.risk.param._risk_score as risk_score0 | rex field=risk_param max_match=0 "\"risk_object_field\":\"(?<risk_object>\w+)" | rex field=risk_param max_match=0 "\"risk_object_type\":\"(?<risk_object_type>\w+)" | rex field=risk_param max_match=0 "\"risk_score\":(?<risk_score>\d+)"
| rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | rex field=search "mitre_tactic=(?<mitre_tactic>.+)" | rex field=search "mitre_technique=(?<mitre_technique>.+)" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","")
| search actions=risk | eval risk_object=coalesce(risk_object, risk_object0) | eval risk_object_type=coalesce(risk_object_type, risk_object_type0) | eval risk_score=coalesce(risk_score, risk_score0) | eval data_source=coalesce(index, datamodel)
|table risk_object |dedup risk_object |sort risk_object

| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | rename action.risk.param._risk as risk_param action.risk.param._risk_object_type as risk_object_type0 action.risk.param._risk_object as risk_object0 action.risk.param._risk_score as risk_score0 | rex field=risk_param max_match=0 "\"risk_object_field\":\"(?<risk_object>\w+)" | rex field=risk_param max_match=0 "\"risk_object_type\":\"(?<risk_object_type>\w+)" | rex field=risk_param max_match=0 "\"risk_score\":(?<risk_score>\d+)"
| rex field=search "index=(?<index>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "sourcetype=(?<sourcetype>.+?)\s" | rex field=search "datamodel:?\W?(?<datamodel>\w+)" | rex field=search "mitre_tactic=(?<mitre_tactic>.+)" | rex field=search "mitre_technique=(?<mitre_technique>.+)" | eval index=replace(index,"\"","")
| search actions=risk | eval risk_object=coalesce(risk_object, risk_object0) | eval risk_object_type=coalesce(risk_object_type, risk_object_type0) | eval risk_score=coalesce(risk_score, risk_score0) | eval data_source=coalesce(index, datamodel)
| table title actions risk_param risk_object risk_object_type risk_score search index sourcetype datamodel mitre_technique mitre_tactic data_source |fillnull value="nothing listed"
| search data_source=$data_token$ AND mitre_tactic=$mitre_tactic_token$ AND mitre_technique=$mitre_technique_token$ AND risk_object=$risk_object$

panel.title: Index Not Being Used by Program

search.query: | tstats count where index=* by index, sourcetype | search NOT [|inputlookup risk_data_index.csv | fields index] | stats values(sourcetype) as sourcetype by index
